import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Main.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CategoriesData from "../datas/CategoriesData"; import CategoriesWomenData from "../datas/CategoriesWomenData"; import CategoriesLimelight from "../datas/CategoriesLimelight"; import FeedbackData from "../datas/FeedbackData"; export const Main = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const handleClickLeft = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide === 0 ? 8 : prevSlide - 1)); }; const handleClickRight = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide === 3 ? 0 : prevSlide + 1)); }; return ( <> {/* Spotlight Section */}

); }; export default Main;
